msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'ea3-02'.

author: horwat
msg: Remove dependancy on "/examples" relative context. Make it user settable.

author: luehe
msg: Added response buffering assumption/requirement to section discussing response encoding (section 3)

author: horwat
msg: Implement 0-based indexing (as opposed to the JDBC 1-based indexing) for Rows and Columns to be consistent with the behavior of other JSTL tags. Modify sql web application to reflect changes.

author: luehe
msg: Expanded significantly on the section about the locale-determination logic for resource bundles by adding examples.
